title: Make every user-visible Tensor have a Storage
body_html: I changed the semantics of THPTensor_(New)(THTensor *ptr) slightly to simplify error handling in calling code. Previously, the function "stole" the reference to ptr on success but left the refcount unchanged on error. Now the refcount is decremented when NULL is returned.
body_text: I changed the semantics of THPTensor_(New)(THTensor *ptr) slightly to simplify error handling in calling code. Previously, the function "stole" the reference to ptr on success but left the refcount unchanged on error. Now the refcount is decremented when NULL is returned.
body: I changed the semantics of THPTensor_(New)(THTensor *ptr) slightly to simplify error handling in calling code. Previously, the function "stole" the reference to ptr on success but left the refcount unchanged on error. Now the refcount is decremented when NULL is returned.
